page.title: 01A SUMMARY OF RURAL SHAWBURY
page.content: Most people live in{Stanton}and on the{Mytton Estate} in{Shawbury.}There are two disused schools. There is a little chapel at Moreton Mill and{ {churches}at Moreton Corbet and Stanton. There are lots of{footpaths}that are ploughed up but they are being resurveyed.There are some other old buildings like the{mill}at Moreton Mill and the{castle}at Moreton Corbet. Most of the land in the area is farmland but there are some woods.The River Roden runs through the area.The main{industry}is farming. Some people work on farms or in the egg packing station. There are many winding country roads but the main road,the A53,Shrewsbury to Market Drayton road,runs through the area.The only{amenity}is the shop at Stanton.
